column4: Hello, people. I'm really sorry for just barging in here and writing like this. I'm kinda short with time and need a little help. Is there anyone available? Again, sorry for no introduction or anything. Oh, and if I have broken any rule by writing like this, sorry about that, too.
instead of writing all that you could have just asked...
boot to root recovery and run: apt-get -f install
reboot and press ESC when grub starts to load, then select recovery mode, then select root
